content: क्रांत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} Gone, passed over, traversed &c.; ({%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} of क्रम् <ab>q. v.</ab>). --तः {@--1@} A horse. {@--2@} A foot, step. {@--3@} Declination. --तं {@--1@} Going, passing. {@--2@} A step. {@--3@} A certain aspect in astronomy (when the moon is in conjunction with a planet).
